dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Miscellaneous Details
dataObjects.description: "Taxonomic Notes: Horabagrus nigricollaris was described by Pethiyagoda and Kottelatt (1994) from Vettilapara on the Chalakudy River, 26 km upstream of Chalakudy Town, Kerala, India."

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Brief
dataObjects.description: "Red List Category & Criteria: Least Concern ver 3.1 Year Assessed: 2010  Conservation Actions: Currently there is no specific action plan directed towards Ambassis dussumieri. Research on the population status, ecology and threats to the species is essential."

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits hill streams at upper reaches of rivers (Ref. 41236).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: Distribution
dataObjects.description: "Range Description: This fish is endemic to Kerala State in Southern India. It is known from the Vettilapara region of the River Chalakudy (Thomas et al. 2002, Raghavan 2008a, Ali and Prasad 2007, Ali et al. 2008) and the Pooyamkutty region of the River Periyar (Kurup and Radhakrishnan 2006, A. Ali pers.obs.) in Kerala, India. The species is known from a river length of 17 km (300 m width) in the Chalakudy River and from 3 km length (300 m wide) in the Pooyankutty River. There is a dam restricting movement on Periyar River (C.P. Shaji pers. comm.). Countries - Native: India (Kerala)"

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Asia:  Chalakudy River in Kerala, India.
